title: Police search for 14-year-old girl who has been missing overnight after in her school uniform
text:
A desperate search is underway for a missing teenage schoolgirl who was last seen wearing her school uniform.

Police have issued an appeal asking for help to find Tyler Byrne from Abergele, North Wales.

The 14-year-old was last seen in Kinmel Bay at around 7.30pm on Thursday October 17.

She was last seen wearing a grey and purple school uniform and was carrying a tan coloured River Island handbag.

Anyone who has seen Tyler or has information about her whereabouts by calling police on 101 quoting reference X151537.
description: Police have issued an appeal asking for help to find Tyler Byrne from Abergele, North Wales. The 14-year-old was last seen in Kinmel Bay at around 7.30pm on Thursday October 17
